motion_philosophy.approach: Subtle and purposeful - supports reading, never distracts from conversion goals
motion_philosophy.feminine_energy: Soft, flowing motions that feel organic not mechanical - like breath and nature rhythms
motion_philosophy.performance: No CLS, GPU-accelerated transforms/opacity only, maintain <16ms frame budget
motion_philosophy.psychological_foundation: Motion builds trust through predictability and enhances perceived value through refinement

hero_content.implementation: Add 'motion-entrance' class to each element with appropriate delay

amanda_card.implementation: Combined scale-in entrance followed by subtle breathing animation

cta_button.idle: bg-burgundy-700 text-white shadow-strong transform-gpu transition-all duration-300

magnetic_effect.on_hover_approach: before:absolute before:inset-0 before:bg-burgundy-600 before:opacity-0 before:transition-opacity before:duration-200 hover:before:opacity-10

fade_on_scroll.trust_strip: Fade out as user scrolls down to focus on core message
fade_on_scroll.secondary_elements: Progressive disclosure - fade in trust elements as user shows interest

scroll_indicators.not_needed: Hero is designed to be immediately actionable without scroll indication

focus_management.preserve_focus_rings: Always maintain focus-visible rings for keyboard navigation
focus_management.static_emphasis: Use color/opacity changes instead of transforms for emphasis
focus_management.accessible_cta: Maintain button prominence through color contrast, not motion

gpu_acceleration.transforms_only: transform: translateY(), scale(), opacity - never layout properties
gpu_acceleration.will_change_usage: will-change: transform on hover/focus, remove after interaction
gpu_acceleration.composite_layers: Use transform3d(0,0,0) for complex animations to force GPU layer

animation_cleanup.remove_will_change: Remove will-change property after animations complete
animation_cleanup.intersection_observer: Only animate visible elements to save resources
animation_cleanup.memory_management: Clear animation timers and observers on page unload

css_optimization.use_custom_properties: CSS variables for timing and easing functions
css_optimization.combine_transforms: Single transform declaration with multiple functions

cta_magnetism.visual_weight: Scale and shadow increase draws eye naturally to conversion point
cta_magnetism.color_psychology: Burgundy creates urgency while maintaining sophistication
cta_magnetism.motion_timing: Delayed entrance makes CTA feel like natural conclusion to story

trust_building.smooth_reveals: Gradual entrance animations build confidence in professionalism
trust_building.consistent_timing: Predictable motion patterns create sense of reliability
trust_building.amanda_credibility: Floating card animation suggests premium, established expertise

reading_flow.z_pattern_support: Staggered animations guide eye through optimal reading sequence
reading_flow.headline_dominance: H1 appears first to establish primary value proposition
reading_flow.cta_emphasis: Button animation timing ensures it appears after value is established

css_architecture.utility_classes: Extend Tailwind with custom animation utilities
css_architecture.component_classes: Create reusable motion components for consistency
css_architecture.progressive_enhancement: Base experience works without animations, enhanced with motion

javascript_requirements.intersection_observer: For entrance animations on scroll into view
javascript_requirements.prefers_reduced_motion: Check and respect user motion preferences
javascript_requirements.performance_monitoring: Track animation frame rates in development

accessibility_testing.keyboard_navigation: Test all interactive states work without mouse
accessibility_testing.screen_reader_compatibility: Ensure animations don't interfere with assistive technology
accessibility_testing.seizure_prevention: No rapid flashing or high-contrast oscillations

brand_alignment.feminine_energy: All motions flow like breath - organic, not mechanical
brand_alignment.professional_trust: Refined timing and easing suggest premium experience
brand_alignment.conversion_optimization: Every motion supports the goal of form completion
